body_content.explanation: the quality of being certain of your abilities or of having trust in people, plans, or the future:
examples: He has the confidence to walk into a room of strangers and immediately start a conversation.
I have every/complete confidence in her. She'll be perfect for the job.
I don't share your confidence that the market will improve next year.

body_content.explanation: a secret that you tell someone:
If you tell something to someone in confidence, you do not want them to tell anyone else:
examples: Any personal data you provide to us will be held in confidence.

body_content.explanation: to share your secrets with someone, trusting them not to tell other people:
examples: I should never have taken him into my confidence.
